sentences.sContent: We never went back. Instead, we moved to a house near Cincinnati, far from the river.
sentences.sContent_eng: We never went back. Instead, we moved to a house near Cincinnati, far from the river.
sentences.sCn: 我们再也没有回去，而是举家迁往离河很远的辛辛那提附近的另一幢房子。

sentences.sContent: In 1830, only a few miles away from what is now the great city of Cincinnati, lay an immense and almost unbroken forest.
sentences.sContent_eng: In 1830, only a few miles away from what is now the great city of Cincinnati, lay an immense and almost unbroken forest.
sentences.sCn: 1830年，距离今天的大城市辛辛那提几英里远的地方，有一片几乎没有遭受过破坏的大森林。

sentences.sContent: In 2005, Charlie received his doctorate in Adult Sexuality Education from the Union Institute and University in Cincinnati, Ohio.
sentences.sContent_eng: In 2005, Charlie received his doctorate in Adult Sexuality Education from the Union Institute and University in Cincinnati, Ohio.
sentences.sCn: 在2005年，查理获得了俄亥俄州辛辛那提联合大学的成人性教育学的博士学位。

trans.tranCn: 辛辛那提（美国俄亥俄州西南部城市）
